languages.text: [Злорадно оскалиться] "Шанс спустить шкуру с пары-тройки твоих дружков? Жду не дождусь!"
[Give the monster a vicious smile] "Are you offering me a chance to skin a few of your friends? I can hardly wait!"
languages.original_text: [Злорадно оскалиться] "Шанс спустить шкуру с пары-тройки твоих дружков? Жду не дождусь!"

languages.text: [对怪物露出恶毒的笑容]“你是想给我个机会，让我把你的朋友活活剥皮吗？我都等不及了！”
languages.original_text: [Give the monster a vicious smile] "Are you offering me a chance to skin a few of your friends? I can hardly wait!"

traits.locale_text: [对怪物露出恶毒的笑容]“你是想给我个机会，让我把你的朋友活活剥皮吗？我都等不及了！”

languages.text: [Das Monster böse angrinsen] "Bietet Ihr mir die Gelegenheit, einige Eurer Freunde zu häuten? Ich kann es kaum erwarten!"
languages.original_text: [Give the monster a vicious smile] "Are you offering me a chance to skin a few of your friends? I can hardly wait!"

traits.locale_text: [Das Monster böse angrinsen] "Bietet Ihr mir die Gelegenheit, einige Eurer Freunde zu häuten? Ich kann es kaum erwarten!"

languages.text: [Adresser un sourire malveillant au monstre] « Dois-je comprendre que vous m'offrez une chance d'écorcher quelques-uns de vos amis ? J'ai hâte ! »
languages.original_text: [Give the monster a vicious smile] "Are you offering me a chance to skin a few of your friends? I can hardly wait!"

traits.locale_text: [Adresser un sourire malveillant au monstre] « Dois-je comprendre que vous m'offrez une chance d'écorcher quelques-uns de vos amis ? J'ai hâte ! »

languages.text: [Sonreír salvajemente al monstruo] «¿Me estás ofreciendo la oportunidad de desollar a algunos de tus amigos? ¡Porque me apunto!».
languages.original_text: [Give the monster a vicious smile] "Are you offering me a chance to skin a few of your friends? I can hardly wait!"

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír salvajemente al monstruo] «¿Me estás ofreciendo la oportunidad de desollar a algunos de tus amigos? ¡Porque me apunto!».

languages.text: ［モンスターに凶悪な笑みを向ける］「お友達の皮を剥ぐチャンスをくれるのか？待ちきれないな！」
languages.original_text: [Give the monster a vicious smile] "Are you offering me a chance to skin a few of your friends? I can hardly wait!"

traits.locale_text: ［モンスターに凶悪な笑みを向ける］「お友達の皮を剥ぐチャンスをくれるのか？待ちきれないな！」

languages.text: [Canavara melunca gülümse] "Dostlarının derisini yüzmeme fırsat mı vereceksin? Sabırsızlanıyorum doğrusu!"
languages.original_text: [Give the monster a vicious smile] "Are you offering me a chance to skin a few of your friends? I can hardly wait!"
